website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, easy-to-use vacuum that's a good fit for large, single-story homes.
pros: Works on carpet and hard floors
Switch settings on the handle, rather than having to bend down
Easy to maneuver into tight spaces
cons: Weighs 20 pounds, so it's not ideal for carrying up and down stairs

customer_reviews.title: If you like a vacuum that gets clogged all the time this baby is for you.
customer_reviews.text: I hate this vacuum with a passion. I can't wait until my new Hoover gets here and I can take this out in the middle of the street and smash it to smithereens with a hammer. First, it gets clogged EVERY TIME I use it. See where the hose connects to the machine? See that sharp curve? Every time I vacuum something gets caught there. It does next to nothing on carpets and the attachment it comes with doesn't work well on hard floors. I had to buy something extra for that. It's a pain in the neck to empty and reattach. I'm getting angry just typing this review.
customer_reviews.author: Monchichipox

customer_reviews.title: I depended on an old and good name which has been sold to Malasia and this ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not do my research when I bought this vacuum. I depended on an old and good name which has been sold to Malasia and this vacuum is now made there. It's "quality" reflects that change. It overheats after an hour, it is heavy, overturns easily, and does not pick up debris on the carpet as it should and as it is advertised. Do NOT buy this or any Dyson vacuum - they are no longer any good.
customer_reviews.author: Susan & Dart Humeston

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've given this vacuum an honest try on carpet and smooth services. It does fine on smooth surfaces but when I use it on carpet, I can't even tell where I've used it. I am very disappointed in the lack of suction and performance. It is going to Goodwill as soon as I can find a vacuum that will at least pick up light weight dust and fuzz. I am just sad, I was counting on it doing the job for me in a small house with less traffic than most.
customer_reviews.author: SheriA

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum but they cheaped out where the suction tube mounts to the base.
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. Powerful suction. Not insanely loud. I was skeptical about the retractable cord because I've had other products where the retractable cord binds and gets stuck causing you to try over and over again to get the cord to fully retract. Not so with this product...it successfully retracts every time. I only have one gripe with this particular model. Where the suction tube for the vacuum attaches to the base seems a bit flimsy. It's just a small plastic slot that it slides into. There is a bit of play so the suction tube doesn't feel firmly in place. When I'm pushing it around my house I worry that I'm going to break the mounting clip.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bonham

customer_reviews.title: Love the Canister Vac
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the yellow upright ball vac at the same time. I didn’t know if I would like the canister vac after reading some of the reviews. I love it. I sent the upright back and kept the canister. It has the same suction but to me the yellow ball upright vac felt cheap. I have the old yellow Dyson and it’s solid. The new uprights feel cheap. Anyway, it’s a great vacuum and I’m so happy with the purchase so far. The canister is light and it was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum cleaner works great for its small size and shape
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner works great for its small size and shape. It is a bit unwieldy at times, but it does what I need it to. It doesn't come with very many attachments, and the ones it does come with are really basic. It does a good job for what I paid for it. I'm happy with my purchase. PROS: Reusable dirt/dust bin Retractable power cable Small footprint Decent suction CONS: Unwieldy makes it irritating to use Retractable cable barely works Lack of decent attachments REVIEWED: 07/27/2016 This review is only the opinion of the author, and should not be considered advice.
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Man

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied, even after repair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this vacuum for a few years now. Generally it’s a smart little invention but mine didn’t work properly from the start. It would shut off randomly and then turn back on every 5 minutes. I contacted the company and they repaired it. A few months later it started doing it all over again and it also won’t switch from it’s spinning setting to the regular one at most times. All in one this vacuum has been one big disappointment to me and more frustration than it’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: I Humperdoo

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my fusion
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my fusion. My mother has had hers, which is almost identical to my new one that is 8 years old and still works like a charm. I’m so glad to have bought this, it does an awesome job on both my wood/laminate floors as well as rugs and carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't believe how much this vacuum picks up. I have 3 dogs, 2 of which are german shepherds, and this thing not only pulls up all their hair off the carpet, but pulls out a significant amount of dirt that I never knew was there. It's pretty compact and the wand collapses for storage and portability. My only complaint is that I fill the canister very quickly. I basically have to empty it after vacuuming every room, because overfilling the canister affects suction. I attribute this primarily to my dogs. It would probably be fine for someone with fewer or no pets. If I had it to over, I probably would've purchased the Dyson Big Ball.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Closeout because motor will die soon?
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well, but crapped out after 1 year, 8 months of once-a-week usage. The motor failed, and Dyson says (after phone call) that this model is not covered by a warranty as this is a 'close out' sale.
customer_reviews.author: Rururudy

customer_reviews.title: Love this little Dynamo!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fast shipping.. AMAZON Warehouse is fantastic! Only the box was a bit banged up, the vacuum is perfect! I love this little Dynamo! How did I live without it. I have some carpet but mostly wood. It works great on both. It really SUCKS, cannot believe what came out of my carpets! We are net freaks and really thought our floors were immaculate! WOW! The canister was full of dirt and dust! I highly recommend this vacuum!! Lightweight and easy to empty, no bags! Thank you Amazn and Dyson!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Not terribly thrilled with this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Not terribly thrilled with this vacuum. I have two Dyson uprights that I love, but needed something for the laminate floor in our mud room. Vacuum works ok on the laminate floor, but can't pick up the slightest bit of debris on the mats at the doors. Maybe I am expecting too much of it, but I am disappointed nevertheless.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Canister versions of Dyson NOT RECOMENDED
customer_reviews.text: We LOVED our Dyson Animal upright. We have many dogs, just under 600 lbs of dogs... in the house. Lasted several years but much less than the several decades the Kirby did. When the power head on the upright failed we got another Dyson, this canister. IT SUCKS, and not in a good way. There is a narrow point that kibble and stuff gets caught in. The canister is too small around the sides and needs a homemade tool to clean it out. I DO NOT recommend the canister versions of Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Do your research before buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I have be using Japanese vacuum for years and I still have an old one work OK. Because I need a powerful one, I bought this giant. It is heavy and it is very hard to use. Cleaning the head brush always gave me trouble, because it is SO HARD to close it after you spending HARD time to open it. It is a strong man's work! frustrating! Do your research before before buying it and understand how much stress you can handle.
customer_reviews.author: YSSCHMITT

customer_reviews.title: In Love!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my eye on this vacuum ever since I was married three years ago. On Prime Day, the price dropped and I couldn't beat the price, so I took the plunge! The vacuum is lightweight, easy to use, has great suction power, the canister detaches easily for emptying, and this is basically everything I've ever hoped for in a vacuum! So far, worth every penny spent!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean. Breaks down often. Had to purchase several replacement parts within one year.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Purchased a Dyson because it has a good reputation. Yet, the vacuum always clogs. Whether the clog occurs in the hose or in the handle stick, it clogs every time I use it. It is very difficult to clean the machine (it requires cleaning very frequently), and I’ve had to purchase several replacement parts within one year of use. It is also very dirty when attempting to clean the machine. Dirt gets everywhere. The dustbin opens awkwardly and it is, accordingly, difficult to empty the contents into a trash can. Choose another option
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be Great for responsible folks.
customer_reviews.text: The Dyson Ball Multi Canister unit is actually a very powerful system. Not sure if this is what you would want if kids had to use. Not sure it would survive their abuse.
customer_reviews.author: N E Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Dyson...I was expecting much more. This vacuum is good on hard floors, but even on very low pile it is extremely hard to push the brush head around. The suction is okay, I have had better in other vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl lambert

customer_reviews.title: Worst repair service ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is average but after 4-5 month it's already broke. I expect more from such an expensive product. The dyson repair service is the worst I've ever seen. You have to ship your dyson to the repair center and wait many weeks for the repair. Meanwhile you have no other vacuum cleaner. It's ridiculous. I'll never buy a dyson again, save your money. If you have any problems with your dyson, change it with Amazon if possible.
customer_reviews.author: AnLiHau

customer_reviews.title: This is a horrible Vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible Vacuum cleaner. Ive had two cheap ones before hand and thought by getting a dyson i would finally have a great product. Wrong, its difficult to use. Its heavy, I hate the spinning brush as it gets hair and everything caught in it. I just wanted a normal vacuum cleaner with a normal head and suction, t his one is awkward and bulky to maneuver around the apartment. It also shut down ponce because it overheated, i don't understand why I live in a small apartment and we used it also on our couch, most vacuums should be able to handle that.
customer_reviews.author: MI

customer_reviews.title: Love My Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at close out for $299.00. It arrived in a timely fashion and was very easy to put together. The suction is very good and works wonders picking up hair from one dog and two cats. I have a three level town home and it is light and easy to haul up all the stairs. It is easy and simple to empty with no mess. I absolutely love this vacuum and it is well worth the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a Dyson and finally got around to buy one. Very happy with my purchase! This vacuum is larger and heavier than I expected it to be, but not too bad for carrying around on stairs and around our apartment. Works super on our cement floors and carpets as well. Easy to clean and take apart. I also love all the moveable parts on it - the vacuum never gets stuck around the corners and moves easily on any surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum Cleaner Ever
customer_reviews.text: This Vacuum cleaner has the strongest suction is any other that I have owned. Sometimes it so strong that I have to be careful to make sure it doesn't suck up something other than dirt. It is s canister type and holds its power even when almost full of dirt. It is relatively easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: moodiblues

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Dyson, Don’t Look Further:)
customer_reviews.text: Mother in Law loves it. She gets to obsessively clean every corner and drag the vacuum with her. She is impressed with all the gadgets she has received.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra Soldo

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Dyson is known for great products that are built to last and preform well. this DC39 is the very best vacum I have ever used or owned. The power and ease of use are incredible. I have no problem using this vacum to clean my home of over 2000 square feet. I love this vacume and I thank Dyson for making my cleaning chores a simple task. The tools are so easy to change. Excellent product, great value!!!! Thank You Dyson!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful Warrior

customer_reviews.title: It started to malfunction after about 10 times using it (turns off after a few minutes like it overheats
customer_reviews.text: Hard to maneuver and clean, especially the brush roller. Does not reach under sofa, drawer, etc, which the old one (different brand) did. It started to malfunction after about 10 times using it (turns off after a few minutes like it overheats, then turns back on after a minute or so).
customer_reviews.author: Monika Spiessberger

customer_reviews.title: ... my only concern is that it doesn't seem as sturdy as the previous Dyson vacuum I've owned
customer_reviews.text: It works very well my only concern is that it doesn't seem as sturdy as the previous Dyson vacuum I've owned. I'll update in a few months if anything goes wrong but as of this writing it is working great just seems like its all plastic and for the price I kind of expected a little more.
customer_reviews.author: GregoryD

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for just 6 months and it's the worst Dyson product we've ever owned! It gets clogged easily, it overheats and blows the fuse, and it doesn't work well on tile or carpet. We've had nothing by Dyson vacuums for many years, but if this is what their new quality looks like, then it looks like I may be buying a Shark.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Schultz

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I really love this vacuum so far. I’m not sure what the long term ability and durability is but Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Broken wand and replacement is on back order
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t know, we received our vacuum and the wand was broken. I called Dyson and they said the wand would be out overnight. Then we received an email stating the wand would not be delivered until Oct or Nov.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Ferrera

customer_reviews.title: This is the best vacuum I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I have ever owned. I cannot believe how much dirt my old one left behind. Would buy again without hesitation. It maneuvers so easily, and I can plug into one central outlet, and do entire living area-very long, sturdy cord. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Recommended merchant. All the Dyson stuff is expensive
customer_reviews.text: Ordered by mistake. My wife tried it and would not let me send it back. Our top-of-the-line, Consumer-Reports-recommended Sears vacuum now sulking in the basement. Quick service. Recommended merchant. All the Dyson stuff is expensive, but good.
customer_reviews.author: 04aQuiet

customer_reviews.title: Super Power
customer_reviews.text: It has super power! I do not think that I can use any vacuum after I used Dyson. But if you look for so comfortable , you may want to have cordless one.
customer_reviews.author: Burak Demirel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy to use vacuum! It is a bit pricey, but you won't need another vacuum. It cleans the rug to wood floors with a touch of a button. The suction is great. You will be amazed how much stuff you empty out.
customer_reviews.author: amy a.

customer_reviews.title: Yay for Mr. Dyson.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum sucks big time. I have a large one bedroom apartment that is completely carpeted. This is a great machine. It has a very long cord and moves so easily I thought I was doing something wrong. So far I love this and thing the engineering is amazing. Easy to use, to put together and to store. Nothing bad to say.
customer_reviews.author: petuniabeth

customer_reviews.title: & it is great for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: Every time I vacuum I am astounded at how much it picks up! I have pets, & it is great for pet hair. I got the multifloor model, as I have both hardwood & carpet to clean. .It is very lightweight, but that is deceiving, as it is very powerful!
customer_reviews.author: Katz07

customer_reviews.title: Major failure after 1 year use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Dyson a year ago and kept filters clean weekly. After a year of normal/weekly use in a medium size house, it started smell electrical burn. I understand it's a motor failure and it needs to be replaced. This vacuum cleaner is extra fragile and does not last. Definitly not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Scoffié

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: A very good vacuum. I’m using it for the 3rd year. I hope it will continue to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: OlgaK

customer_reviews.title: We have to keep it out and handy (7 pets) but the tube doesn't stay nicely in one place
customer_reviews.text: only problem is storing it. We have to keep it out and handy (7 pets) but the tube doesn't stay nicely in one place. It is a fantastic vacuum and I'm very glad we got it. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S.A. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Product design
customer_reviews.text: First order never come. Amazon fast 2nd delivery in 2 days. Product is good: light weight, vacuum good lot of dust from my carpet, less noise, quiet vacuum machine. It doesn't have motor at vacuum head (design use suction from 1 motor) .Push & pull vacuum head kind of heavier than vacuum I owned before. But do good work.
customer_reviews.author: Mixer

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Came with a broken piece on the end of the tube. Called Dyson customer service and they replaced the whole tube within a week or 2. Great customer service, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Randomjulz

customer_reviews.title: Nice vacuum, but broke out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum works well, good suction but power head would not stop and start out of the box. Amazon was great and willing to give a refund, but turns out we were able to get dyson to warranty it even though we bought across border to Canada. It took some effort but ask to talk to supervisor if they say they can't help. They can. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Clean air after filters. Easy to maintain. Convenient handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy to use, powerful suction, like the bag less feature. Still getting used to the "spinning power brush" which is what comes in contact with the floor or carpet. It just seems puny. I suppose it's job is to just lightly brush the carpet so suction can go to work. It certainly doesn't carve a path or leave a sweeping trail on the carpet fibers. The bag less canister is easy to manage & empty. Unit stores well in small area.
customer_reviews.author: Toujour

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise its easy to use and has great suction power
customer_reviews.text: This product works well on bare floors; wood or tile but not on carpet. The beater bar brush is air driven and does not have enough power for carpets, at least not my carpets. Otherwise its easy to use and has great suction power.
customer_reviews.author: roberta s colvin

customer_reviews.title: Not recommandable!
customer_reviews.text: Never worked properly. Had to be expensively repaired and even then did not work! Refurbished junk!
customer_reviews.author: vd

customer_reviews.title: Bought a used one and it's great. Lot's of dust and dog hair in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a used one and it's great. Lot's of dust and dog hair in my house and this picks it up everywhere. I thought I would be cleaning the reusable filter constantly but haven't had to. I don't know if I'd pay full price retail but used is good value.
customer_reviews.author: topazzzer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect... until it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: For a vacuum of this price and reputation, I really didn't expect it to stop working within a few months. The main reason I chose this specific model was the ability to turn the brush head on and off; after just a few months the brush head won't stay on unless the suction is off. Incredibly disappointing! I'm guessing I just got a defective model.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality compared to the Dyson vacuum that this one replaced
customer_reviews.text: Parts are not washable like my prior Dyson vacuum and not as good quality. Will go back to a model more comparable to prior model. Very basic vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra P.

customer_reviews.title: Fully satisfied with the results I experienced
customer_reviews.text: Just received and tried it once. Fully satisfied with the results I experienced. I bought it "used in good to excellent condition. I was skeptical about a used purchase, but am fully satisfied with it and would consider a used purchase again. Very pleased with its performance!
customer_reviews.author: Dave A.

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for my son who claims it is the best vacuum cleaner in the world
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son who claims it is the best vacuum cleaner in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Aduba

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic vacuum, I'm amazed at how much dirt and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic vacuum, I'm amazed at how much dirt and pet hair it pulls out of the carpet! Had it about 6-8 months with absolutely no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacum cleaner !
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and very user friendly. I would highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: so good. I've only had it for about a month
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I've only had it for about a month, but it works very well. We finally wore out our upright Dyson, which we had for many years. I no longer have carpets, and wanted the ability to reach and get under things that a canister can offer. It's taking me a bit to get used to a whole new feel to vacuuming, but I think this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dyson is hard to beat. This vacuum can be used for many different purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Reints

customer_reviews.title: So Clean
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. They're expensive but I have to tell you I love how my house is so clean. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: The attachments suck
customer_reviews.text: This Dyson is not as good as my upright animal Dyson. The main attachment for the floor sweeper is floppy and terrible. I would not buy this again - next time it is back to my upright - the best vacuum on the planet!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Material Defect In Design -- DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Well, there's a bottleneck in the air flow such that about 20 minutes of vacuuming results in a blockage. What an overpriced piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: JD Bugglesworth

customer_reviews.title: I own 2 of these.  Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I already bought one of these about 4 years ago and love it so much I bought another for the second floor. It is so light and easy to move around and gets into the corners real well. I have mostly hardwood floors and wanted I think this unit does a better job on hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: M.V.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this Dyson! After a solid 2 months of use it’s still running perfect. Easy set up. We have 2 cats and a German Shepherd and the amount of hair this picks up is amazing! What’s really gross is the dust particles you don’t see. Don’t hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Great Vacuum! The attachments are easy to use. Simple to switch from vacuuming tile to carpet floors. Great air release feature to vacuum delicate rugs so they don't get sucked up. Easy adjustment to vacuum stairs and hard to reach places. Stores easily as well!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Coates

customer_reviews.title: would not buy this again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'v used this vacuum 7 months and the motor has already blown. This vacuum does not like sucking anything up popcorn size it gets stuck at the hose going into the canister and there is no easy way to clear the small opening. Not worth the $318 I spent. I'd rather use a shop vac.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hyfte

customer_reviews.title: The suction is not that great.
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit heavy and awkward to move around and doesn't fit in the closet very well. As I said above, the suction isn't that great.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Shepley

customer_reviews.title: but it is a great vacuum. Not great for carpets
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to get used to after having the upright, but it is a great vacuum. Not great for carpets, but does a terrific job on tile, hardwood, and vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: ... am sure that for many that this is a great vacuum for some
customer_reviews.text: I am sure that for many that this is a great vacuum for some, however, for me it was completely useless. I have many small Persian style area rugs and this vacuum just pulled them up into the beater bar and it stopped turning. This in turn made it necessary to turn off the vacuum and pull the rug out of the beater bar head. Furthermore, the return policy of this company is costly. $47.00 in UPS charges and a 15% restocking fee!!!!! Pretty steep for something that was not satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Lars E. Eriksson

customer_reviews.title: Shame on Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: not what I expected. the sweeper head isn't heavy enough to adhere to the carpet. the brush is air powered, the nap from the carpet slows it down.it works good on hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: Locktite

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: very very strong machine, cleans everything on the carpets. highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: rabia

customer_reviews.title: Only if your young and able to drag
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like is the dragging it around. The suction is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only concern is that the waste canister connection looks vulnerable
customer_reviews.text: got what I bought. Only concern is that the waste canister connection looks vulnerable. But it worked great out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Hermann von Gersdorff

customer_reviews.title: Better handling in small spaces and well
customer_reviews.text: Works far more easier then the typical American vacuum cleaners. Better handling in small spaces and well, it's a Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: okay its a bit pricey but its a great vacuum! Great suction and the hard floor adapter ...
customer_reviews.text: okay its a bit pricey but its a great vacuum! Great suction and the hard floor adapter makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: MissMargo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my vacuum. I bought the additional attachment for wood floors. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: April Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vac
customer_reviews.text: So far this vac is great. It does a wonderful job. It's easy to operate and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Fojtik

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum was broken out of the box. Dirt bin would not click into place because the plastic clip was broken.
customer_reviews.author: traveling one

customer_reviews.title: ... and it finally gave up the ghost after many good years of service
customer_reviews.text: I've had the first Dyson and it finally gave up the ghost after many good years of service. Now I have all wood floors and the is the cat's _ _ _ _.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Munro

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed with Dyson
customer_reviews.text: This is my third dyson and it amazing. I also have the upright and the hand vac. Hoping this holds up as well as the others. It's a dyson so it should!!
customer_reviews.author: Madam Bazam

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is everything I wanted and needed. Works great for keeping up the dust, dirt and dog hairs that I need to keep my home welcoming.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Blake

customer_reviews.title: Love my Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Love my Dyson. It is lightweight and easy to move. Only comment is the quality of the fittings. They seem to mark/gouge easily with everyday wear n tear.
customer_reviews.author: M J.

customer_reviews.title: Never thought vacuuming could be so easy
customer_reviews.text: OMG! It's dirt monster! So so light and EASYGOING to use. Unbelievably easy to clean. Worth every penny! Changed my life
customer_reviews.author: Goli

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. Easy to maneuver and picks up all the dirty
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: It picks up dust wonderfully, but it's hard to get the rug brush ...
customer_reviews.text: It picks up dust wonderfully, but it's hard to get the rug brush to stop when pushing down the button. The brush has to be on a rug to get the button to stop it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know how clean and how easy to clean my house
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how clean and how easy to clean my house. I have 3500 sq. feet and I can dust everything and do all the floors in 1 1/2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Turbine head failed in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: The turbine head failed in less than a year. We had to by a new head for $50.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: I love the style of this vacuum and it's not as ...
customer_reviews.text: As far as I'm concerned, you can't beat a Dyson Vacuum. I have two long haired cats and Dyson is the only vacuum that will actually get all the fur up. I love the style of this vacuum and it's not as bulky as most vacuums. My place is small and I can get into areas that a regular vacuum won't go. I'm so glad I finally bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Broke in just a little over a year!! Very disappointed. Hard to get hold of Dyson customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Finerfrock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! Great suction and easy to break it down and clean all the parts!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I liked the vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I liked the vacuum cleaner. What I did not know was that it did not come with any type of warranty or instructions on how to use it, clean it and if I had to give it any maintenance. So far it is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sevilla

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: One year and two weeks motor went out. Don’t waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It isn't the quality I had expected. I am hoping it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Sksgarden

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase! The reviews had me believe it would not be great on carpets but actually im very impressed. Would definetly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mikrut

customer_reviews.title: The suction is good and I like the no bag design
customer_reviews.text: The suction is good and I like the no bag design. Emptying is easier on another vacuum I have. The ball steering I like. It is quite light weight.
customer_reviews.author: David Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: not what I thought used it a couple times
customer_reviews.text: not happy with this product . need something easier to use
customer_reviews.author: Carol F.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great job vacuuming, but difficult to get the dirt basket off.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: We had a Miele for many years and loved it. Our new Dyson works well and I ...
customer_reviews.text: So light! We had a Miele for many years and loved it. Our new Dyson works well and I can do the stairs easily because of it's light weight.
customer_reviews.author: CMM

customer_reviews.title: works great, love the power in this little machine
customer_reviews.text: showed up in exactly the condition described. works great, love the power in this little machine.
customer_reviews.author: Dander Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: gets into all kinds of nooks and crannies. Great vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more from Dyson. The vacuum head scratches hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum! Easy to use and love that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum! Easy to use and love that the cord automatically winds up with the push of a button. Has great suction and love the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: The handle is quite short, I'm tall and I ...
customer_reviews.text: The handle is quite short, I'm tall and I can't extend it so got a sore back vacuuming... works well, just not enjoyable to use
customer_reviews.author: Felicity Witt

customer_reviews.title: This is a truly excellent and elegant machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly excellent and elegant machine. I have been so dissatisfied with other vacuums that I had reverted to sweeping and dusting sometime ago. This vacuum cleans better, not just more efficiently, than if you did it meticulously by hand. A must have for anybody who desires a clean home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dyson Ball Multi Floor Canister Vacuum, Yellow/Iron
product_meta.description: Dyson received the highest numerical score among canister vacuums in the J.D. Power 2015 and 2017 Vacuum Satisfaction Studies. 2017 study based on 6,965 total responses from 9 companies measuring the opinions of consumers who purchased a canister vacuum in the previous 12 months surveyed in February-March 2017. Your experiences may vary.
feature_bullets: Designed to clean across all floor types. Maximum Reach - 45 feet
The only turbine head controlled at the handle. No bending down
Hygienic bin emptying. Just push the button to release the dirt. Bin Volume - 0.53 gallons . Suction Power - 280AW
Whole-machine HEPA filtration traps allergens and bacteria inside the machine
Ball technology. Steers easily into difficult places. Washable lifetime filter - just wash and re-use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars523 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
